content: **crocheted top with square in drops paris the piece is worked from the middle out with stripes sizes s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern w-894 yarn group c or a + a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **yarn** drops paris from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 50-50-50-100-100-100 g colour 17 off white 50-50-50-50-50-50 g colour 58 powder pink 50-50-50-50-50-50 g colour 60 mauve 50-50-50-50-50-50 g colour 61 lime 50-50-50-50-50-50 g colour 64 amethyst 50-50-50-50-50-50 g colour 65 rust 50-50-50-50-50-50 g colour 71 tangerine **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 5 mm **crochet gauge** 14 treble crochets in width and 8 5 row in height = 10 x 10 cm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
